cgcloud__Product_Assortment_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Product_Assortment_Template__c
cgcloud__Product_Assortment_Template__c.description: Template for product assortments. Controls the behavior of the instances of this template. For example, if a business partner is to be specified (AccountMultiplicity). This table is dependent on the sales organization.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Account_Multiplicity__c.description: Indicates the number of business partners that can be assigned to an assortment of this template.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Boolean to identify whether the Product Assortment template is active.

cgcloud__Consider_For_APL_Generation__c.description: Determines the Product Assortment to be considered in the Account Product list.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the product assortment template belongs.
